content: 4 break yarn leaving an 8 20 cm tail thread through live round 1 purl all sts sts and fasten_off soak in cool water and wool wash and round 2 * k1 yo k1 in same st k1 wrapping yarn 2 times block to measurements 3 times repeat from * around round 3 *p3 sl 1 pwise wyib dropping extra wrap 3 pom pom times transfer 3 elongated sts to lh ndl k3tog repeat from * make a 2 5 7 cm diameter pompom secure pom pom to around hat and tie off inside round 4 knit all sts round 5 purl all sts label round 6 * k1 wrapping yarn 2 times 3 times k1 yo k1 in using sewing thread or yarn provided in kit and a sharp same st repeat from * around sewing needle sew kelbourne woolens label to brim as round 7 * sl 1 pwise wyib dropping extra wrap 3 times shown transfer 3 elongated sts to lh ndl k3tog p3 repeat from * around round 8 knit all sts repeat rnds 1 8 for patt ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 2 year of hats 12 more designs from kelbourne woolens share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #yearofbulkyhats ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved v 1 12 2 22 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 3
